changelog:
### Changelog
- Added new features
- Fixed bugs
- Improved performance
install_instructions:
To update the HuxPlayers addon, download the latest version from [GitHub](https://github.com/RecuvaPumDEV/huxplayers) and upload the `huxplayers.blueprint` file to your Pterodactyl directory (usually `/var/www/pterodactyl`). Then, in your terminal (Putty, Termius, etc.), run the command:

```
blueprint -install huxplayers
```
